column6: TEENAGE WASTELAND PART 2 The Runaways welcome a new member into their fold, but will this dashing young man help the teenagers defeat their villainous parents...or tear the team apart?
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Takeshi Miyazawa | colorist:Christina Strain | writer:Brian K. Vaughan | inker:Craig Yeung
